body_html:
I think a related issue (?) is NaN values when we sample from the Beta distribution using the sample_size arg.

In [1]: import torch.distributions as dist
In [2]: dist.Beta(1., 1.).sample((3, 2, 1))
Out[2]:
tensor([[[0.6530],
         [   nan]],

        [[0.5000],
         [0.5000]],

        [[0.5000],
         [0.5000]]])

body:
I think a related issue (?) is `NaN` values when we sample from the `Beta` distribution using the `sample_size` arg. 

```python
In [1]: import torch.distributions as dist
In [2]: dist.Beta(1., 1.).sample((3, 2, 1))
Out[2]:
tensor([[[0.6530],
         [   nan]],

        [[0.5000],
         [0.5000]],

        [[0.5000],
         [0.5000]]])
```
